termsAndPrivacyHeading.10: 4. Withdrawal of Consent and Data Deletion
termsAndPrivacyHeading.12: 1. Registration and Access to the Application

termsAndPrivacyContent.3: Your location is collected and used to enable the functionality of the application. Exact information about your location is not stored, and the entered locations (e.g., 'Belgrade, Splav Rich') are stored in the database to enable search and finding other users. You have the option to disable sharing your location at any time.
termsAndPrivacyContent.4: Information you enter about your appearance, hair color, eye color, clothing, and attire is stored in the database to allow other users to find you based on these criteria.
termsAndPrivacyContent.5: Information you enter about vehicle registration, such as license plates, is stored to enable other users to find you based on vehicle registration.
termsAndPrivacyContent.6: If you choose to share links to your social networks and phone number, this information will be available to other users if they find you based on your criteria.
termsAndPrivacyContent.7: Users do not have the right to use other people's personal information, including phone numbers, social networks, photos, and vehicle plates.
termsAndPrivacyContent.8: We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent unless required by applicable laws or judicial authorities.
termsAndPrivacyContent.9: Your personal information is stored securely, and we use various technical and organizational measures to ensure that your data is protected from unauthorized access.
termsAndPrivacyContent.10: You have the right to withdraw your consent for data collection and usage at any time. You can also request the deletion of all data you have entered into the application.
termsAndPrivacyContent.12: 1.1. By registering for the application, you accept these terms of use.
termsAndPrivacyContent.13: 1.2. You have the right to use the application in accordance with applicable laws and these terms.
termsAndPrivacyContent.14: 2.1. You will not use the application for purposes that violate the laws or the rights of other users.
termsAndPrivacyContent.141: 2.2. You will not misuse the personal data of other users or share them without their consent.
termsAndPrivacyContent.142: 2.3. Users do not have the right to use the personal information of others, including phone numbers, social networks, photos, and vehicle plates.
termsAndPrivacyContent.15: 3.1. We reserve the right to change these terms of use at any time. Updated terms can be found in the application.
termsAndPrivacyContent.16: 3.2. These terms of use constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the application.
termsAndPrivacyContent.17: Please carefully read and understand this Privacy Policy and Terms of Use before using the application. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us.
